Ã¢â‚¬Å“Jericho RoadÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½ was produced by Glen Scott, a young Englishman originally from Jamaica endowed with outstanding talent and creativity. Eric gives a whole new meaning to the blues of the 21st Century, proving that the genre remains as lively and relevant as ever. Jericho Road is an event in itself, and a superlative album.
